verses.verse: Beloved, <S%G27><s%> do not believe <S%G4100><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> but test <S%G1381><s%> the spirits <S%G4151><s%> to see whether <S%G1487><s%> they are from God; <S%G2316><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> have gone <S%G1831><s%> out into the world. <S%G2889><s%>

By this <S%G3778><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that confesses <S%G3670><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has come <S%G2064><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is from God; <S%G2316><s%>

and every <S%G3956><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> that does not confess <S%G3670><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is not from God; <S%G2316><s%> and this <S%G3778><s%> is the [spirit] of the antichrist, <S%G500><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> you have heard <S%G191><s%> that it is coming, <S%G2064><s%> and now <S%G3568><s%> it is already <S%G2235><s%> in the world. <S%G2889><s%>

You are from God, <S%G2316><s%> little <S%G5040><s%> children, <S%G5040><s%> and have overcome <S%G3528><s%> them; because <S%G3754><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> is He who is in you than <S%G2228><s%> he who is in the world. <S%G2889><s%>
They are from the world; <S%G2889><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> they speak <S%G2980><s%> [as] from the world, <S%G2889><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> listens <S%G191><s%> to them.

We are from God; <S%G2316><s%> he who knows <S%G1097><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> listens <S%G191><s%> to us; he who <S%G3739><s%> is not from God <S%G2316><s%> does not listen <S%G191><s%> to us. By this <S%G3778><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%> and the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of error. <S%G4106><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> let us love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> for love <S%G26><s%> is from God; <S%G2316><s%> and everyone <S%G3956><s%> who loves <S%G25><s%> is born <S%G1080><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and knows <S%G1097><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
The one who does not love <S%G25><s%> does not know <S%G1097><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> for God <S%G2316><s%> is love. <S%G26><s%>

By this <S%G3778><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> was manifested <S%G5319><s%> in us, that God <S%G2316><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> His only <S%G3439><s%> begotten <S%G3439><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> into the world <S%G2889><s%> so <S%G2443><s%> that we might live <S%G2198><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Him.

In this <S%G3778><s%> is love, <S%G26><s%> not that we loved <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but that He loved <S%G25><s%> us and sent <S%G649><s%> His Son <S%G5207><s%> [to be] the propitiation <S%G2434><s%> for our sins. <S%G266><s%>
Beloved, <S%G27><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> us, we also <S%G2532><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> has beheld <S%G2300><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> at any <S%G4455><s%> time; <S%G4455><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> in us, and His love <S%G26><s%> is perfected <S%G5048><s%> in us.
By this <S%G3778><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> that we abide <S%G3306><s%> in Him and He in us, because <S%G3754><s%> He has given <S%G1325><s%> us of His Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

And we have beheld <S%G2300><s%> and bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> [to be] the Savior <S%G4990><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> confesses <S%G3670><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> in him, and he in God. <S%G2316><s%>

And we have come <S%G1097><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> and have believed <S%G4100><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> for us. God <S%G2316><s%> is love, <S%G26><s%> and the one who abides <S%G3306><s%> in love <S%G26><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> in God, <S%G2316><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> abides <S%G3306><s%> in him.

By this, <S%G3778><s%> love <S%G26><s%> is perfected <S%G5048><s%> with us, that we may have <S%G2192><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment; <S%G2920><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> as He is, so also <S%G2532><s%> are we in this <S%G3778><s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

There is no <S%G3756><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> in love; <S%G26><s%> but perfect <S%G5046><s%> love <S%G26><s%> casts <S%G906><s%> out fear, <S%G5401><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> involves <S%G2192><s%> punishment, <S%G2851><s%> and the one who fears <S%G5399><s%> is not perfected <S%G5048><s%> in love. <S%G26><s%>
We love, <S%G25><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> He first <S%G4413><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> us.

If <S%G1437><s%> someone <S%G5100><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "I love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>" and hates <S%G3404><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> he is a liar; <S%G5583><s%> for the one who does not love <S%G25><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has seen, <S%G3708><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> love <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he has not seen. <S%G3708><s%>

And this <S%G3778><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> from Him, that the one who loves <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> should love <S%G25><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
